name: Verify a phone number from a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet row using Veriphone
description:
Every time a phone number is added to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet as a new row, Make will automatically verify it in Veriphone and update the row with data of your choice.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygSME4hqmy03nvSoQ?e=YVqDjb).
